items.name: claw hammer
items.description: claw hammers are good for killing zeds. but be careful, they can get stuck inside the skull.

items.name: ball peen hammer
items.description: ball peen hammers are effective at bashing brains, and don't get stuck as easily as clawed ones.

items.name: roofing hammer
items.description: roofing hammers are excellent weapons. the long handle and hatchet blade make them doubly effective.

items.name: souvenir sword
items.description: souvenir swords look cool, but are not real weapons and should not be used in combat.

items.name: authentic sword
items.description: real swords are effective in removing heads but they can be a little clumsy.

items.name: kitchen knife
items.description: kitchen knives are great for chopping vegetables, but they can bend or break under stress.

items.name: steel banjo
items.description: a steel banjo can be used to break a few heads. But it is heavy and will break eventually.

items.name: iron frying pan
items.description: with an iron frying pan you can cave in a zombie's skull or fry an egg. how can you miss?

items.name: metal bat
items.description: metal bats are noisier but lighter than wood ones. they are very useful melee weapons.

items.name: wood bat
items.description: wood bats are good two handed weapons that can take out a zombie with ease.

items.name: field hockey stick
items.description: field hockey sticks are made from hardwoods like hickory and can be very effective.

items.name: cricket bat
items.description: cricket bats are heavy and are made from hardwood like baseball bats, but they have more of an edge.

items.name: machete
items.description: machetes make excellent weapons. good for slashing and chopping, they are lightweight and highly lethal.

items.name: ice axe
items.description: ice axes are very good weapons. However be careful, they tend to get stuck inside things. they were designed that way.

items.name: sledge hammer
items.description: sledge hammers are great for breaking things, but they are heavy and clumsy to wield.

items.name: large axe
items.description: a large axe is an excellent weapon. Even though it takes two hands to swing, it gets the job done.

items.name: steel pipe
items.description: a piece of steel pipe can actually do as much damage as a hammer or baseball bat and only takes one hand to swing.

items.name: shovel
items.description: If you don't have anything better handy, shovels are great at chopping, bashing, and cutting.

items.name: garden shears
items.description: garden shears don't exactly make the perfect weapon. But, they can be used as a slashing or stabbing weapon.

items.name: hatchet
items.description: a hatchet is a one handed weapon that packs a punch. Although the short handle can be a drawback.

items.name: crow bar
items.description: A crowbar is long, light, and strong. the perfect combination for knocking heads or prying stuff open.

items.name: pole arm
items.description: This polearm is a medieval weapon known as a Halberd. It resembles an axe with a spear at the end

items.name: battle axe
items.description: the battle axe is a heavy, two handed medieval weapon. if you find one and use it, people might refer to you as "conan."

items.name: broad sword
items.description: This sword is a heavy bladed weapon that takes two hands to wield. It can be very useful in melee combat.

items.name: samurai sword
items.description: Real katanas are folded over 400 times for strength and when properly sharpened, can cut through a man with one stroke

items.name: medieval mace
items.description: a mace is a medieval weapon that resembles a spiked iron ball on the end of a short handle. they are very effective.

items.name: katana sword
items.description: Japanese for ""sword"" Katana swords were the weapon of choice for Samurai.  "

items.name: fire axe
items.description: a fire axe is a formidable weapon, designed to be strong and lightweight, it can easily cut through a wooden door.

items.name: assault shotgun
items.description: a 12 gauge shotgun with a different stock and shortened barrel, the tactical is an excellent defensive weapon

items.name: assault rifle
items.description: The AR-15 is a semi-automatic rifle that is lightweight and easy to reload. Although the 5.56 round is small, it packs a punch.

items.name: .45 auto pistol
items.description: This semi automatic is a magazine fed .45 caliber pistol with a magazine capacity of 7 rounds

items.name: submachine gun
items.description: the MP5 is a is a magazine fed, blowback-operated, submachine gun that is capable of firing 800 rounds per minute.

items.name: revolver
items.description: the time tested .22 caliber revolver has proven accurate and reliable, best for targets at less than 30 yards.

items.name: semi auto pistol
items.description: the 9mm is a lightweight and effective semi-automatic, magazine fed, handgun that is best for short range targets.

items.name: .44 magnum
items.description: the .44 magnum revolver joins incredible muzzle velocity, accuracy, and reliability to make this a top notch platform.

items.name: magnum pistol
items.description: the .357 revolver has been a popular choice for law enforcement for decades for good reason, it is as deadly as it is accurate.

items.name: shotgun
items.description: a 20 gauge shotgun is an excellent deterrent against any aggressor. this is a single shot weapon.

items.name: pump shotgun
items.description: the pump shotgun holds five 12 gauge shells and reloads quickly.

items.name: sawed off shotgun
items.description: While not great against targets at ranges in excess of 15 feet, it can be very effective in tight quarters.

items.name: auto shotgun
items.description: probably one of the most lethal hand held weapons in the world, a 12 gauge automatic brings a lot of pain to the party.

items.name: double shotgun
items.description: the double barreled shotgun provides you with a single do-over if you miss the first time.

items.name: hunting rifle
items.description: Bolt action hunting rifles have excellent accuracy and a high muzzle velocity but reloading can be cumbersome

items.name: semi auto rifle
items.description: the semi automatic rifle offers a high rate of fire and a magazine that can hold a large number of rounds.

items.name: target rifle
items.description: target rifles were designed to be accurate at long range, but they were not designed with damage in mind.

items.name: carbine rifle
items.description: Carbines are rifles with slightly shorter barrels, sacrificing accuracy for versatility.
the hunting, or compound, bow is easy to learn how to use. But it is slow to reload, even for seasoned bow hunters.
items.name: hunting bow
.50 cal rifle
items.description: the .50 caliber rifle is a very heavy weapon and is best used from fixed positions.

items.name: crossbow
items.description: the crossbow offers an easy, accurate platform for archers, but it is very slow to reload.

items.name: billy club
items.description: the billy club is very effective at close range against unprotected skulls.

items.name: fire axe
items.description: the fire axe is a light weight weapon with a fiberglass handle that is easy to wield with two hands.

items.name: flashlight
items.description: a flashlight is one of the most important things you can have in the event you need to see in the dark.

items.name: police flashlight
items.description: police flashlights offer a good source of artificial light that can also crack a skull if needed.
headlamps are very useful in lighting your way without encumbering your hands.
items.name: headlamp

items.description: bolt cutters can be invaluable in cutting through locks, chains, and fences.
items.name: bolt cutters
tool kit
items.description: tools are important for fixing things that break, and for gaining entry to locked doors, etc.
duct tape is one of the most useful things you can have. it can be used for anything. if you don't have some, find some.
items.name: duct tape
first aid kit
items.description: something as simple as a first aid kit can mean the difference between life and death.

items.name: backpack
items.description: backpacks make carrying a load a lot easier, while freeing your hands to do other things.

items.name: duffle bag
items.description: duffle bags are very useful for carrying heavy loads or for carrying a large number of items.
binoculars give you a better view of things in the distance, and can prevent you from walking in to a dangerous situation.
items.name: binoculars
night vision
items.description: night vision goggles are very useful, they can make a night time operation much safer and easier to negotiate.
kevlar is an added layer of protection that is lightweight and durable enough to stop a bullet.
items.name: kevlar vest
riot helmet
items.description: riot helmets offer protection for the head, neck and face, all favorite bite targets of zombies.
motorcycle helmets offer protection against head injury and bite attacks, but can limit peripheral vision and hearing.
items.name: crash helmet
riot shield
items.description: riot shields can be used for defense and as a weapon, but only when placed in hand on the weapons layer.

items.name: respirator
items.description: a respirator can come in handy in a situation with reduced air quality.

items.name: water purifier
items.description: water purification is very important since most municipal water supplies are no longer functional.
rope is a must have item which has many uses.
items.name: rope

items.description: part of the pasgt or "personal armor system for ground troops", these helmets used by the military in all branches of the military, and provide lightweight protection for your noggin.
items.name: riot helmet

items.description: lighters are very helpful. fire good.
items.name: lighter

items.description: gas cans are great for carrying gas and other flammable liquids.
items.name: gas can

items.description: being able to collect and transport water is very important. you can't have too many water bottles.
items.name: water bottle
multiTool
items.description: a multi-tool offers easy access to simple tools like screwdrivers, pliers, scissors and a blade.

items.name: pocket knife
items.description: the pocket knife always comes in handy when you have to cut something, or someone.
can't see the sky? look at your compass.
items.name: compass

items.description: you may have to mend a shirt, or even suture a wound. a sewing kit will help.
items.name: sewing kit
plastic tubing
items.description: plastic tubing can be used for building a water purifier or even used to tie someone's hands, you never know.
water filters are useful for obvious reasons. Don't drink contaminated water.
items.name: water filter

items.description: flares can be used to signal others, create distractions, or start fires.
items.name: flares
HAM radio
items.description: HAM radios are only useful if someone is out there who can hear your broadcast.
gas generators are excellent, if loud sources of portable power, but they require gas.
items.name: gas generator
tent
items.description: tents are good in a pinch, though they don't offer much in the way of protection.

items.name: whistle
items.description: a whistle can be useful for signaling someone, or creating a distraction.
fishing line is useful not only for fishing, but it can also be used to rig traps as a tripwire.
items.name: fishing line
leather gloves
items.description: leather gloves protect the hands against injury and infection.

items.name: blanket
items.description: blankets are warm, and offer a layer of protection against cold conditions as well as bites.
waterproof matches are much better than wet, soggy matches.
items.name: waterproof matches

items.description: candles are good for a bit of soft light, and they can be used to make a fuse for an explosive!
items.name: candles

items.description: bleach is a very useful ingredient to have in several applications
items.name: bleach

items.description: dental floss can prevent the gum disease gingivitis, and can be used to make a tripwire.
items.name: dental floss

items.description: a bb gun is not lethal, but can be very useful in creating distractions, as well as triggering remote mechanisms.
items.name: BB Gun

items.description: slingshots are useful weapons that in the right hands can be lethal.
items.name: slingshot
snare wire
items.description: snare wire is useful for many things, including restraining someone, trip wires, and traps.

items.name: vitamins
items.description: vitamins are healthy and help you stay strong. you will need all the help you can get.

items.name: camp stove
items.description: camp stoves run on bottled propane, and can be very useful for heating and cooking applications.
camp stove fuel can be used to fuel a camp stove, or an as improvised explosive.
items.name: camp stove fuel

items.description: scissors cut things, and can be effective weapons if used "in"correctly.
items.name: scissors

items.description: sunglasses can limit the amount of glare and protect the eyes from UV rays.
items.name: sunglasses
zip ties
items.description: zip ties are an excellent fastener with almost unlimited usefulness.

items.name: batteries
items.description: batteries are self explanatory, you will have an almost unlimited need for batteries.
bike tires, tents, all things rubber can benefit from a tire repair kit, especially tires.
items.name: tire repair kit

items.description: kerosene lanterns make reliable sources of light, and are safe to operate.
items.name: kerosene lantern

items.description: kerosene is a stable fuel that burns well, but is not as explosive as gasoline.
items.name: kerosene

items.description: pepper spray can be a good deterrent agains humans, but has been known to have little effect on the undead.
items.name: pepper spray

items.description: allows a person to easily open cans without the need for a tetanus shot.
items.name: can opener
hack saw
items.description: hack saws cut through steel, which is very useful, can also be used to cut cleanly through bone.
wood saws are excellent for cutting wood, and can also cut bone, although its a bit messy.
items.name: wood saw

items.description: a car battery can be an excellent source of DC power, but they need to be charged regularly.
items.name: car battery

items.description: thermal underwear provides an additional layer of protection against the cold.
items.name: thermal underwear

items.description: work boots have steel or reinforced toes which help prevent injury and have durable, thick soles.
items.name: work boots
soap
items.description: soap makes you smell better than you do right now.

items.name: shampoo
items.description: shampoo will give your hair that radiance and bounce that says that you are in control of this apocalypse.
coffee is the best thing that ever happened to mankind.  it is more valuable than gold
items.name: coffee
combat helmet
items.description: the advanced combat helmet is designed to protect troops from the effect of blast and flash fire associated with IED explosions

items.name: tarp
items.description: tarps are valuable in building shelters, hiding valuables, and building traps.

items.name: aluminum foil
items.description: aluminum foil has many uses, cooking, collecting rain water, building traps, repairing electronics, and many more.
powdered milk is great because unlike fresh milk, it has a very long shelf life.
items.name: powdered milk

items.description: lantern mantles are valuable if you have a kerosene lantern.
items.name: lantern mantles

items.description: dog food is valuable if you have a dog, or if you yourself are very hungry. the proteins are crude, but it beats starvation.
items.name: dog food

items.description: the .22 magnum revolver is a sturdy and accurate handgun with minimal report and recoil.
items.name: .22 magnum pistol

items.description: the chisel is useful in breaking locks and making small rocks out of big rocks.
items.name: chisel
sterile suture kit
items.description: anything sterile is rare, and sutures can prevent excessive blood loss

items.name: antibiotics
items.description: besides the undead and rival survivors, infection is your worst enemy

items.name: M60 machine gun
items.description: the m60 is a heavy but powerful belt-fed machine gun used by the us military since the 1950's.  heavy and difficult to use without a fixed mount.
walkie talkies are very useful for remote communication, but you'll need a pair of them.
items.name: walkie talkie
combat knife
items.description: combat knives or survival knives are used in close hand to hand combat, as well as clearing away brush and other utility purposes.
GPS location satellites still orbit the earth, and although its rare, some GPS devices do continue to function on some level
items.name: GPS device

items.description: made by Gerber, the gator pro is the ultimate machete.  can be used an axe, machete or knife, and the rubberized handle for improved grip.
items.name: Gator Pro
hand grenade
items.description: the M67 fragmentation grenade is a spherical, hand thrown grenade that contains 6.5 ounces of composition B explosive.  It uses a 3 second fuse, and has an injury radius of 15 meters.

items.name: flash bang grenade
items.description: the stun grenade, or "flash bang" grenade is a non-lethal explosive device used to temporarily disorient the opponent with a blinding flash of light and loud noise without causing permanent injury.

items.name: concussion grenade
items.description: the concussion grenade is designed to damage it's target by it's explosive power alone.  greater weight and volume than a fragmentation grenade, but a smaller effective casualty radius.
bicycles can be used to cover a larger span of distance in a shorter amount of time while moving fairly quietly.
items.name: red bicycle
orange bicycle
items.description: an orange bicycle.  bicycles can be used to cover a larger span of distance in a shorter amount of time while moving fairly quietly.
a smart car.  extremely fuel efficient, but fairly small, these cars provide a mode of transportation that is adequate, while not entirely rugged.
items.name: smart car

items.description: a pink moped
items.name: moped
motorcycle
items.description: motorcycles provide a fast mode of transportation for up to two passengers and a small amount of gear, but there are many dangers in riding, always wear a helmet.
a dirt bike
items.name: dirt bike

items.description: a trusty vw van
items.name: vw van

items.description: a humvee
items.name: humvee

items.description: a skateboard
items.name: skateboard

items.description: a good 'ole jeep
items.name: jeep

items.description: a green four door compact car
items.name: green compact car

items.description: a blue compact car
items.name: blue compact car

items.description: a truck with a camper top
items.name: camper truck

items.description: a green pickup truck
items.name: green pickup truck

items.description: a full size white van
items.name: full size van
harley
items.description: motorcycles provide a fast mode of transportation for up to two passengers and a small amount of gear, but there are many dangers in riding, always wear a helmet.

items.name: brass knuckles
items.description: some form of brass knuckles have been used all over the world for hundreds of years.  despite their name, they are often made of steel.  because they fit over the fingers and fit into the palm of the hand, they are easily concealed.

items.name: no weapon
items.description: bare fists are not the best weapon against an opponent, try to find something to use as a weapon.
This tactical vest offers supreme combination of coverage and mobility. It includes a trauma plate that protects against blades and sharp objects.
items.name: Level 3 Body Armor
Tactical Boots
items.description: designed for law enforcement and military, these tactical boots offer excellent protection and mobility.

items.name: screwdriver
items.description: screwdrivers are useful for inserting and removing screws.  they can also puncture a skull.

items.name: wire cutters
items.description: wire cutters are useful for cutting wire, but not much else.
who is that?  andrew jackson?  doesn't matter.  it will crack a skull real good.
items.name: bronze bust
Crawler
items.description: if the brain is not destroyed, the remains of the infected will continue to animate, no matter how dismembered they may become.  crawlers usually don't pose much of a threat, as they often lack mobility.

items.name: Walker
items.description:
the most common type of infected, walkers move at a slow but steady pace with ruthless determination.  
they are not difficult to kill or evade in small numbers, but in large groups they can be lethal.
the most dangerous and rare cases, these are the recently infected who still possess much of their strength and coordination.  they move very fast and are very strong.
items.name: Runner

items.description: rival survivors are competing for the same resources as you are, and as far as they are concerned, you are a threat to their survival, approach with caution.
items.name: rival survivor
distant walker
items.description: walkers can be dangerous when they get close to you.  try to take them out from a distance when possible

items.name: distant rival
items.description: rival survivors can be extremely well armed and just as dangerous.  the element of of surprise may be the only advantage you have.

items.name: enthusiast
items.description: this type of survivor has no professional or military background, but they often have a gun, and they are very excited to use it.
this type of survivor is proficient with a rifle or shotgun. they may have had some military or professional training.
items.name: survivalist
mercenary
items.description: mercenaries are trained in the art of combat, as well as in the use of firearms.  they are disciplined and dangerous.
enthusiast at a distance, cannot be attacked with melee weapons
items.name: distant rival

items.description: Survivalist at a distance, cannot be attacked with a melee weapon
items.name: distant survivalist

items.description: mercenary encountered at a distance that cannot be attacked with a melee weapon
items.name: distant mercenary
trapped_zomb
items.description: sometimes the undead can become trapped and are unable to attack.  they are much easier to kill this way.

items.name: Crawler

items.description: dave is your lifelong friend and companion, he is loyal and trustworthy.  he is comfortable using a cricket bat, and prefers it to most any other weapon.
items.name: dave
petra
items.description: petra is a lovely woman, a mother of two, she is smart, strong, and extremely capable of handling herself.
vic is young and brave, he seems loyal, but not confident enough to be a leader.
items.name: Vic
kelly
items.description: kelly is smart, and advanced in her ability to use her sword.  she is useful in a fight.
luke is young and brave, almost to a fault, not the strongest in a fight, but he is loyal.
items.name: luke
nate
items.description: nate is a reliable guy, quiet but determined, and steadfast in his desire to destroy the undead at any cost.

items.name: margo
items.description: margo was a stay at home mom before the world ended.  now her family is all dead, and she fights on.  she is fragile at times, but trustworthy.
a career criminal before the outbreak, aaron is a self sufficient survivor, he is loyal, but only as long as things are going good.
items.name: aaron
kristi
items.description: kristi may be a little off her rocker, she lost her best friends in the apocalypse, which isn't that unusual, except that they were all cats.

items.name: mike
items.description: mike is a nice kid, somewhat scared at times, but he is a good person.  its might be best not to leave him alone.
shaun is a friend, he will stick by your side but may need a bit of a hand in the beginning.
items.name: shaun

items.description: sally is a no-nonsense kind of person.  she is tough but fair, and has no problem taking out the undead if they get in her way.

presentation.header_text:
you must choose the best option that results in the best outcome possible

You may choose to read through the tutorial, or choose a start point.  

“tank mode” simulates a survival situation where you are heavily armed
presentation.story_text: zday survival simulator is a text-based game that simulates realistic situations and scenarios that you might encounter in a global zombie apocalypse.

presentation.header_text: the dense population is going to mean a lot of infected with such a quickly spreading virus.
presentation.story_text: you are in your house, you have to grab  few things and get out of here, it’s not safe.

presentation.header_text: when you find another one-handed weapon, touch the empty fist to wield both. would you like to grab something else hand now?
presentation.story_text: you are a first class ninja. don't forget to peel off the price tag before you use that thing.

presentation.header_text: you could wield another one handed weapon, or choose to keep one hand free.
presentation.story_text: the machete is an excellent slashing and chopping weapon. it is light and easily wielded with one hand.
the claw hammer is a good choice for hand to hand combat, but the head could get stuck when impacted into a skull.
presentation.header_text: when you find another one-handed weapon, touch the empty fist to wield both. would you like to grab something else now?

presentation.story_text: you barricade your windows and doors. the noise from hammering and moving furniture has attracted undead to your door.
presentation.header_text: there is someone outside your front door that wants to come in...
what kind of shoe would you choose in this situation?
presentation.story_text: before you leave, you need to put on shoes.
the machete is an excellent slashing and chopping weapon. it is light and easily wielded with one hand.
presentation.header_text: you take it with your free hand. they will come for you soon. will you stay here and fight the horde or try to get to safer ground?

presentation.story_text: the claw hammer is a good choice for hand to hand combat, but the head could get stuck when impacted into a skull.
presentation.header_text: you take it with your free hand. they will come for you soon. will you stay here and fight the horde or try to get to safer ground?
you take it with your free hand. they will come for you soon. will you stay here and fight the horde or try to get to safer ground?
presentation.story_text: you are a first class ninja. don't forget to peel off the "made in china" sticker before you use that thing.

presentation.header_text: two other droolers have joined your friend at the front door. they are trying to break it down!
presentation.story_text: you have turned off the lights, but the undead aren't fooled. they appear determined to get in.

presentation.header_text: you do not have time to rebuild your barricade, and there are more coming.
presentation.story_text: you have beaten the groaners at your door, but shadowy figures move all around you. your neighborhood has been overrun.
you only have two hands, would you prefer to bring some kind of bag to carry more things?
presentation.header_text: which would be the best choice in this situation?
you only have two hands, would you prefer to bring some kind of bag to carry more things?
presentation.story_text: hiking boots are an excellent choice: ankle support and good for any weather or terrain. rubber soles allow for quiet movement.

presentation.header_text: it seems like only a matter of time before you will be found. maybe they can smell your brains!
presentation.story_text: from your hiding place in the closet, you can hear the doors and windows break. they are in your house!

presentation.header_text: there is only one way in and one way out, but the basement door can't hold forever. there are more than twenty zombies in your house when the door gives way!
presentation.story_text: you run to the only place you can, the basement.  you lock the door, the basement windows are too small to crawl out.

presentation.header_text: it will also provide extra protection from rear attack. would you like to take a minute to gather useful items like a flashlight, duct tape, and a first aid kit?
presentation.story_text: a backpack is a good choice, allowing you to carry supplies and keep your hands free.

presentation.header_text: items like a flashlight, duct tape, and a first aid kit would be useful.
presentation.story_text: there are some items in your house that may be useful to you, but you will need to take a few minutes to gather them.

presentation.header_text: your best friend dave lives right next door. he owns a pistol and you will need some help.
presentation.story_text: you are outside. there are corpses everywhere, figures stumbling around in the dark, cars burning - it is not safe here.

presentation.header_text: you do not have enough time to fully barricade your house again - more are coming!
presentation.story_text: the good news: you survived a horde of zombies in your house. the bad news: you're not getting your security deposit back.
you manage to slay over a hundred undead, their corpses clog the basement stairwell to the height of your chest.   you must crawl over them to escape.
presentation.header_text: the sound of shamblers in the house is unmistakable, there are more of them, you must escape if you want to survive.

presentation.story_text: the horde is dead, but your house in torn to pieces and is no longer defensible. you have to get to somewhere safe.
presentation.header_text: your best friend dave lives next door, he owns a pistol.

presentation.story_text: it takes only minutes for you to gather the items, but you hear sounds coming from your back door.
presentation.header_text: someone is trying to break in at your back door!

presentation.story_text: dave has given you his pistol. this area is not safe, there are thousands of infected nearby.  it would take too long to barricade all of the windows in this house.
presentation.header_text: dave asks you what you want to do, but seems convinced that staying here is a bad idea.  he tells you the tv news says the hospital has been over run.

presentation.story_text: the streets are dark, and jammed with abandoned cars and the remains of the dead and dying.
presentation.header_text: you hear occasional screams in the distance. several houses and cars are empty, and you need weapons and supplies.
your best friend dave lives next door. he owns a pistol and you will need some help.
presentation.story_text: that was messy. thick smoke and nearby screams and moans alert you to danger nearby.
you have gathered all the useful items here. suddenly an arm breaks through the front window.

presentation.header_text: a sign on the wall indicates room 302 is to the left past the nurses station.  most of the nurses are in the emergency room.  you can hear a man crying out for a nurse in a room to the right.

presentation.story_text: you get back in the elevator to leave and press the button for the lobby, but just as you do the power goes out.  within a few seconds, red emergency lighting comes on.
the most important thing to remember is to read the text on every page carefully, both in this box as well as the black page below.  both are important, with a subtle difference.
presentation.header_text: the top box is called the “informant text” it generally informs you of your current surroundings, what you might see, hear, smell, or sense.  this box describes the options you have to choose from in some detail.

you may switch weapons any time by opening your inventory tray and dragging weapons to your hands.  you may use either one two-handed weapon or two one-handed weapons.   you may give weapons to any of your survivors too.
presentation.story_text: place found weapons in your inventory by tapping the found item card, or refuse the item by swiping it up and away from your inventory.  logically, you can only use the weapons that are in your hands.

presentation.header_text: the row that survivors are in makes a difference.  survivors in the bottom row will not fight, but cannot be killed or injured.  the higher the row, the more effective they are in a fight, and the more exposed to danger
presentation.story_text: to open your inventory tray, simply tap either your weapon/hands or pack icon on your status bar at the bottom of the screen. place items you wish to use in your hands, and keep items you may need handy in the top row.
when you encounter a survivor you can choose to ask them to join your party.  it is up to you whether or not to add them to your group, but there is safety in numbers.
presentation.header_text: you can equip them with a better weapon, heal them if you have medical supplies, and even protect them by placing them in the bottom row of your inventory.  survivors can help you if they have a good weapon.
the weapon they were using will be replaced into your inventory.  you can see how much ammo is in their gun by viewing their survivor card.
presentation.story_text: to give a member of your survivor party a specific weapon from your inventory, tap the survivor tile to view their survivor card, then drag the weapon you wish to give them onto their card.

presentation.header_text: to heal them, open the survivor card by tapping the tile, and tap the “heal survivor” button.  if you do not have any med kits or do not want to heal them, try placing the survivor in the bottom row where they are safe.
presentation.story_text: if one of your survivors becomes injured, the color background of the survivor tile will change from green to yellow, orange, or red.  if the survivor tile is red, they are badly injured and close to death.

presentation.header_text: you can also target specific enemies by tapping the weapon you wish to attack with then tapping the enemy you wish to attack.  you may do this on behalf of your survivors as well.
presentation.story_text: when you are faced with an opponent, you can choose how to fight.  the weapons in your hands will determine what you attack with.  the placement of the “initiative bar” will determine your style of attack.

presentation.story_text: the television informs you that there has been a global outbreak of the "zombie" virus. you are in a densely populated suburb. this is it - z day!
presentation.header_text: you have no guns in your home. you have a bat, which takes two hands to use. you also have three potential weapons that you can use with one hand: a souvenir sword, a machete, and a hammer.
the men look like the kind of guys that you would cross the street to avoid walking past them.  they don’t seem to be too interested in making friends.
presentation.story_text: you wave the men down, they get out of the car and approach you.  they all have guns.  they order you to drop your weapons and put your hands up.

presentation.header_text: judging by their appearance, these men appear to be the weekend warrior type.  you see they have a car loaded with supplies and weapons, there is a rifle in the front seat of their car, the window is down.
presentation.story_text: you run up to a group of four men who appear to be trying to move a truck that is stalled in the road, they ask you to help them push the truck out of the way of their car.

presentation.header_text: he gets in your face and demands to know why you would push his truck off the road.  he is very angry, and seems intent on getting a satisfactory answer.
presentation.story_text: you help the men push the truck off the road and down the embankment just as a man comes running up yelling.  “that’s my truck!  what are you doing!”  he is a big guy, and he is yelling at you.

presentation.header_text: they tell you that if you give them a hand with the truck they will give you a machete so you can defend yourself, but that’s all they are willing to offer.
presentation.story_text: you ask them if they have room for one more in their group, but they dismiss the idea immediately, they explain that they have a plan, and that it doesn’t include you.

presentation.header_text: you don;t know if the rifle is loaded or not, but the men are moving aggressively toward you.  you can try to run, but will have to outrun all four of them.
presentation.story_text: you grab the rifle, but one of the men sees you, he yells at you to stop, alerting the others.

presentation.header_text: these four men load into their car.  seeing that you don’t have a lot of weapons, one of the men tosses a machete onto the ground.  “good luck” he says as the car drives away toward the gridlock.
presentation.story_text: the farmer was surprised by your attack, he never expected someone like you to attack him in that way.  the four guys are impressed with your bravado, but say thanks for your help, but that they need to get moving.

presentation.header_text: the other four men are not helping you, in fact they are getting in their car and preparing to leave.  you will have to defend yourself.
presentation.story_text: you try to explain, but get three words in before the man punches you in the eye.  you fall to the ground, and he moves to hit you again.
you turn to leave and one of the men grabs your arm. “where do you think you’re going?  you said you would help us, and you’re going to help us.”
presentation.header_text: he places his hand on a large knife he is wearing on his belt, indicating his willingness to use it if you don’t cooperate.
you are in a fight for your life, you have to defend yourself.
presentation.story_text: you try outrunning the men, but one of them runs like a cheetah, and he catches you, causing you to trip and fall hard on the concrete.  he punches you and the other three quickly join in.
